channel.title: Server Announcements
channel.description:
Hey ya'll.
My servers going great at the minute, just adding some tweaks there and here, to get it that little better. Now, at this time I'd really like a command which lets me announce server updates/messages, "[Server] Testing command" <- (Example).
If anyone could help out it would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks, Cccrrraaazzziii

item.title: Server Announcements
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

It seems so simple, and yet I’m sitting here like a lost duck. Thanks .

Read full topic

item.title: Server Announcements
item.dc:creator: @Heroic Heroic
item.description:
@Heroic wrote:

if(command.startsWith("annoc") && command.length() > 5) && playerRights >=3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Server] " +command.substring(5); }

Read full topic
